text: Hagi kora Moapu mopamo'a knare zantfa hu'nege'za hoza antete'za musenkase nehu'za nenaza zamo'a hago vagare'ne. Hagi wainima rentra ahe'za tro'ma nehaza kumapina mago'ene wainia rentra ohegahaze. Hagi kezati'za musenkasema nehu'za wainima rentra'ma nehaza zana osugahaze. Zamagra kezankea hugazanagi, e'i musenkasema nehaza kezankea omane'ne.
